fn.p: Competing Interests: We have the following interests: We thank Qualitas Health, Inc. for donating Nannochloropsis oculata whole cells and co-product for this research. There are no Qualitas Health, Inc’s patents, products in development or marketed products associated with this research to declare. This does not alter our adherence to all the PLOS ONE policies on sharing data and materials.
